directions.heading: Directions
directions.by_car: By Car: Free parking available on Education Lane and surrounding streets. Please be considerate of local residents.
directions.by_transport: By Public Transport: The school is a 5-minute walk from Webitor Station (Northern Line) or a 10-minute walk from the 24, 73, and 134 bus routes.
directions.by_bike: By Bike: Bike racks available for children and visitors at the front of the school.

questions.question: How do I report my child's absence?
questions.answer: Please call the school office on 020 1234 5678 before 9:00am on each day of absence. You can also report absences via our school app.

questions.question: How can I arrange a school tour?
questions.answer: Tours run every Tuesday at 9:30am during term time. Please call the office or use the contact form above to book your place.

questions.question: Who should I contact about my child's learning?
questions.answer: Your first point of contact should be your child's class teacher. You can leave a message with the office or send a message via Seesaw.

questions.question: How do I apply for a place at the school?
questions.answer: Applications for Reception places are made through your local authority. For in-year admissions, please contact our office.

questions.question: Is there parking at the school?
questions.answer: There is no parking on school grounds, but free street parking is available nearby. Please be considerate of residents and avoid blocking driveways.
